entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 p.m. MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 7:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -17.4°C
Wind: ENE 82 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. Wind becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023
